title: Statement from the President on his meeting with Speaker Pelosi and Leader Hoyer | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 02, 2009

 



Statement from the President on his meeting with Speaker Pelosi and Leader Hoyer




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ______________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                              June 2, 2009   The President issued the following statement today after his meeting with Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Majority Leader Steny Hoyer in the Oval Office this afternoon:   Speaker Pelosi, Leader Hoyer, and I had a very productive discussion this afternoon about some of the major issues before Congress.  The House of Representatives has a very busy legislative schedule ahead of them, and I am grateful for the leadership they are providing on our major priorities, including health care reform, energy reform, and restoring fiscal discipline.
